name: Data cleaning operator
description: Import and prepare data for machine learning applications.

properties.name: max_missing_prop_rows
properties.description: Maximal proportion of missing data per row.

properties.name: max_missing_prop_cols
properties.description: Maximal proportion of missing data per columns.

properties.name: min_categories
properties.description: Minimal number of categories per column.

properties.name: max_categories
properties.description: Maximal number of categories per column.

properties.name: numeric_encoding
properties.description: Type of numeric encoding of categorical variables.

properties.name: passthrough
properties.description: Comma-separated list of names of variables to be passed through.
